title: Four Simple .cb* Readers (.cbr, .cbz, .cba, etc.)
description:
Four simple .cb* readers, for your .cbr, .cbz, and .cba files, as well as .pdf and many image formats.


#############################################################

This torrent is a .rar, which contains four .exe files:

     CDisplay 1.8.5.1.exe     
     Comical-Win32-0.8.exe     
     Coview.exe
     setup_gonvisor_1_73_viewer.exe

They are the installers for these programs, respectively:

     CDisplay v1.8.5.0
     Comical v0.8
     CoView v1.0.0.45
     GonVisor v1.73.0.0

#############################################################

Each .exe as well as the .rar have been scanned by Avast and Malwarebytes.  I have also installed all of them on my own system with no problems.  They are all clean; they are the exact files that I downloaded from their distributing websites.   So why torrent them?..




There are many comic torrents here, but I could only find one reader, so I put together the best/only readers I could find in the depths of the interweb.

All these files are available for free from other sources, but I gathered them for the sake of presenting options in a single package.  Each program is similar, but they have different quirks, so you should be able to find one that suits your taste.




The torrent is small, so it won&#039;t take much bandwidth or space.  In other words, you&#039;ve no reason at all not to reseed after downloading.  


Enjoy.
